business.headline: Air India eyes Boeing jets rejected by China amid trade tensions: ReportThe Tata Group-owned carrier, which is undergoing a fleet overhaul and rapid expansion, is in talks with Boeing Co. to acquire several planes that were being readied for Chinese carriers before fresh tariffs disrupted their delivery.

Gensol Engineering may face ED probe for money laundering chargesThe latest development comes at a time when Sebi uncovered a fraud at Gensol Engineering and questions are being raised about the company's financial practices.

Gold touches Rs 1 lakh: 5 things you must knowGold June futures on the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) hit a record Rs 99,178 per 10 grams on Monday. In the physical market, gold was priced at Rs 97,200 per 10 grams.

RBI allows minors above 10 to operate bank accounts. Check detailsBanks have been given the flexibility to set the rules for these accounts based on their own risk management policies. This includes setting limits on the amount of money that can be kept in such accounts and deciding on the terms and conditions.

Why Sensex, Nifty are gaining despite crash on Wall StreetBenchmark indices on Dalal Street opened higher despite Wall Street's overnight plunge. Is this the latest sign that Indian markets are trying to decouple from the US market's volatility?
Sensex, Nifty turn positive after early fall; IndusInd bank down 3%The S&P BSE Sensex added 129.12 points to 79,537.62, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 43.85 points to 24,169.40 as of 9:36 am.

Gold's record rally continues as Trump's Fed chief criticism sinks Wall StreetTrump reiterated his call for an immediate reduction in interest rates on Monday, warning that the US economy could face a slowdown, while criticising Powell's stance to keep rates unchanged until clarity on the inflation impact of Trump's tariff plans.

Stock market opening today: Sensex, Nifty to open flat after Wall Street crash?While Sensex and Nifty ended the previous session at their highest levels since January 6, the sharp fall in US markets overnight may cap gains during early trade on Tuesday.

Stocks to watch on April 22: HUL, HCLTech, Coal India, Paytm, Mazagaon DockShares of HCLTech, Waaree Energies, and Tata Communications will be in focus as they are set to announce their quarterly results today.

The investigation is linked to Hyderabad-based real estate firms accused of fraudulent land deals and unaccounted cash transactions.

Kesari 2 box office Day 4: Akshay Kumar's film stays steady on first MondayAkshay Kumar's 'Kesari Chapter 2,' co-starring R Madhavan and Ananya Panday, released on April 18 and opened with around Rs 7.75 crore. In just four days of its release, the film has earned Rs 34 crore.

Rajinikanth delights fans, waves at them from moving car at Jailer 2 shoot. WatchSuperstar Rajinikanth is presently shooting for director Nelson Dilipkumar's 'Jailer 2' in Kerala. He made his fans happy as he greeted them with a big smile on his face on the film's shooting spot.

He further spoke about how their close friends and family are shocked to learn about how they have never argued in their relationship.

'Andor' Season 2: The most grounded chapter in Star Wars history is backAndor Season 2 premieres on Disney+, offering a grounded, emotional take on the Star Wars universe. With strong writing and rich characters, it explores rebellion through everyday heroes, not Jedi legends.

New Oscar rules require voters to watch every nominee, support refugee filmmakersThe Academy now requires Oscar voters to watch all nominated films in a category. New rules support refugee filmmakers, clarify AI use, and introduce future awards for casting and stunt design

Bhabiji... actor Shubhangi Atre's ex-husband Piyush Poorey dies in IndoreShubhangi Atre's former husband, Piyush Poorey, passed away after battling liver cirrhosis in Indore. The actor was not on talking terms with her husband after their divorce earlier this year.

An honour to welcome JD Vance, says Bhajanlal SharmaUS Vice President JD Vance, currently on a four-day official visit to India, met Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday and hailed him as a "great leader". Strengthening bilateral ties between the two democracies is at the heart of Vance's agenda during this high-profile trip. This morning, Vice President Vance arrived in Jaipur, Rajasthan, where he is scheduled to explore the city's rich cultural heritage. He will visit Amber Fort at 9 am on Tuesday, followed by a keynote address on US-India relations at the Rajasthan International Centre (RIC) at 3 pm. The Vice President is staying at the historic Rambagh Palace during his Jaipur leg. Accompanying him on the visit are his wife, Usha Vance, their children, and a delegation of senior officials from the US administration.
Lucy sends first pictures of 150 million-year-old asteroidThe team was surprised by the odd shape of the narrow neck connecting the two lobes, which looked like two nested ice cream cones.

Sachin Yadav beats Kishore Jena to win Federation Cup 2025Sachin Yadav beat Asian Games silver medallist Kishore Kumar Jena to win the Federation Cup on Monday. April, 21. Yashvir Singh and Sahil Silwal finished in the podium places alongside Yadav.

Sabalenka suffers shock defeat as Ostapenko wins Stuttgart OpenJelena Ostapenko defeated Aryna Sabalenka 6-4, 6-1 in the final and won the Stuttgart Open title. The Latvian also won her first clay-court title since the French Open in 2017.

2025 Boston Marathon: Start time, TV channels, weather and all you need to knowThe Boston Marathon is one of the world's most iconic races. NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna.
